The whole world knew that an April 11, 2002, during the coup in Venezuela, there was a slaughter.
 Several people who were shooting from a bridge in Caracas were identified by the media as the perpetrators of the slaughter that claimed 19 fatalities.
 But with the dead and wounded that day, there is another victim: THE TRUTH.
 This documentary shows pictures, testimonials and key facts of a story that many media hid about the slaughter of Puente Llaguno

 SCRIPT AND PRODUCTION: Angel Palacios

THIS DOCUMENT IS FREE MOVEMENT AND REPRODUCTION
